original: Savicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sa vicāram kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa vicāraḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Savicāraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: sa vicāram akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa vicāraḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
